entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to snow this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
